text:
- Carrier Fire and Security,
we offer a ton of services
and solutions from a digital perspective.

We create value for our customers
across our product lines,
across segments, across geographies.

Between the carrier and
the AWS partnership,

what we have been able to
generate is delivering with speed,

starting small, but gaining
momentum very, very fast

and building on it,
delivering with security

all the way from ideation
to industrialization

and through that spectrum,
and also delivering at scale

through multiple technology
platforms and systems

that we have, as well as the
geographies that we serve.

In terms of, you know,
solving for the challenge

and creating the impact
is one of our solutions,

recently launched solutions,
called Connected Safety Plus.
It enables all our B2B customers

to really better manage
the entire lifecycle

of a fire system, all the way
from installing the system,
all the way to managing it, upgrade.

Building on AWS for us means
bringing speed, scale, security

across all our digital products
and solutions and services

for the life safety and
security businesses.
And we have seen many benefits
that the customers are already reaping.
If you look at our B2B businesses,

that's almost more than
50% productivity for them.

They can really reduce
their cost of inventory,

better manage parts, order at
the right time, right place,
and even it's easier to work with Carrier

through that lifecycle
because we are constantly
in touch with the customer.
(energetic music)
